name: Quicooking
description: This is Quicooking, a game made for the 94th Mini Game: Baking, you can only use the Left Mouse Button (LMB) and Right Mouse Buttons (RMB) to control anything with the game. While in the game, you will receive a recipe according to the client order and you will be given two ingredients to choose from, you must choose correctly between them using the LMB for the left choice and RMB for the right choice. I hope you enjoy it. Good luck. (Please, play it on fullscreen).
